productName.description: Create a compelling SEO friendly name based on the product name of %s

mainColor.description: The primary color of the apparel item as displayed in the image.

secondaryColors.description: An array of secondary colors present on the apparel item. Can be empty if no secondary colors are discernible.

garmentType.description: The type of the garment, such as 'shirt', 'dress', 'pants', etc.

gender.description: The target gender for the apparel item, such as 'men', 'women', 'unisex', etc.

brand.description: The brand name associated with the apparel item.

shortDescription.description: A brief overview of the apparel product.

longDescription.description: A detailed description of the apparel product.
